name: Ultraman Club 2: Kaette Kita Ultraman Club
overview:
Ultraman Club 2: Kaette Kita Ultraman Club ("Ultraman Club 2: The Return of the Ultraman Club") is an RPG for the Famicom released only in Japan during 1990, featuring "super deformed" versions of characters from the "Ultraman" Japanese Tokusatsu television series which originally aired beginning 1966.

Like the show, the game doesn't have much of a story. You just go around fighting monsters and aliens to save people or planets. Battles are essentially like any turn-based Dragon Quest clone.
